main event: The observer reported seeing an unknown type of object in the sky on the indicated date and time.
interesting points: The object was reddish-orange in color and stationary for about 15 minutes before disappearing., The object first appeared at a bearing of 270 degrees and was last seen at 210 degrees., The object was described as having 3 lights in a triangular formation., It moved at high speed and made no sound during the observation., This was the first sighting of this type by the observer.
sighted object: unknown type of object in the sky
